body:
What rclone attempts to do is classify errors into errors which are worth retrying and those which aren't.

This classification is hard to get right though!

It looks like from your log the only fatal errors were these (the other errors were retried).

It should be relatively easy to make these errors retriable

```
2017/10/07 18:22:52 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: Post https://pod-000-1092-03.backblaze.com/xxx: net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 86749635
2017/10/07 18:22:52 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: Post https://pod-000-1092-03.backblaze.com/xxx: net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 86749635
2017/10/09 21:39:29 ERROR : Attempt 3/500 failed with 1 errors and: Post https://pod-000-1093-09.backblaze.com/xxx: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/09 21:39:29 ERROR : Attempt 3/500 failed with 1 errors and: Post https://pod-000-1093-09.backblaze.com/xxx: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
```

It looks like both of these errors are internal net/http errors which aren't exported so I'll have to look for the error strings

```
$ git grep 'transport connection broken'
src/net/http/transport.go:              return fmt.Errorf("net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: %v", err)
$ git grep 'Body length'
length 8"),
src/net/http/transfer.go:               return fmt.Errorf("http: ContentLength=%d with Body length %d",
```

I've added these errors to be retried - please re-open if you find more errors which need the same treatment!

https://beta.rclone.org/v1.38-021-g43ced30f/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Thanks very much for the prompt replies and fix, @ncw!

I'm happy to test these - I can only see Windows builds via the link. Are these changes included in https://beta.rclone.org/rclone-beta-latest-osx-amd64.zip? It has a modification date of today 20:03.
@ncw jumped the gun - can see the commit beta build now. Testing, will let you know how it goes. Thanks again for all the hard work and for rclone!

@ncw The retry behaviour is working with content-length errors, but although rclone tries to retry it doesn't seem like the errors can be recovered from -

```
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 4/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:43 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-04.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 5/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-04.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:44 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-16.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 6/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-16.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:45 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-02.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 7/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-02.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:46 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 8/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:47 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:48 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:48 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-19.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 9/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-19.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 22 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 160ms
2017/10/10 22:02:49 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:02:50 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/10 22:02:50 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2017/10/10 22:02:50 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 10/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
2017/10/10 22:02:50 DEBUG : xxx: Error sending chunk 22: Post https://pod-000-1044-14.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
```

I've left a WAN ping running and it hasn't dropped at all. Perhaps it's the B2 API at fault? It looks like it has gone away -

```
2017/10/10 22:10:39 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-04.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx dial tcp 206.190.208.155:443: getsockopt: connection refused
2017/10/10 22:10:39 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 1.28s
2017/10/10 22:10:39 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 8/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-04.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx dial tcp 206.190.208.155:443: getsockopt: connection refused)
2017/10/10 22:10:40 DEBUG : xxx: Sending chunk 31 length 268435456
2017/10/10 22:10:41 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 640ms
2017/10/10 22:10:41 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/10 22:10:41 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-04.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx dial tcp 206.190.208.155:443: getsockopt: connection refused
```

I'm watching the logs now and different chunks are all encountering content length errors and are at various low level retry passes (using the default of 10 low level retries). This looks like attempted recovery confusion -

```
2017/10/10 22:14:09 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Not enough members for write of xxx: neighbor_down; neighbor_down (500 internal_error)
```

I've attached full logs for the session in case there's a pattern emerging. Let me know if there's any additional testing which I can do - happy to try with bumped up low level retries to see if things eventually recover. It's still stumbling on with later chunks, I'll update the ticket in the morning and let you know if it eventually recovers. Low level retry limit 10/10 on a chunk doesn't bring the entire operation down. **Full logs here -** [rclone.log](https://github.com/ncw/rclone/files/1373466/rclone.log)

Hi again @ncw - rclone hasn't moved on (progress feedback shows no extra uploaded data or percentage complete increase) after the first "body length 0" errors. It attempts low level retries but these never trigger a full retry. The full log above is still representative, last output before cancelling -

```
2017/10/11 03:39:08 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 2m30s
2017/10/11 03:39:08 DEBUG : xxx: Didn't find object to account part transfer
2017/10/11 03:39:09 DEBUG : xxx: Clearing part upload URL because of error: Post https://pod-000-1044-09.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0
2017/10/11 03:39:09 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 5m0s
2017/10/11 03:39:09 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 2/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1044-09.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)
```

issue.title: Backblaze B2 large file copy fault tolerance - Request to reopen #1733

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body: Apologies if I'm missing something but I can't find a way to reopen #1733. I've submitted test feedback for the v1.39 milestone. Please can the ticket be reopened and this ticket closed, thanks.

body:
The log looks like something went wrong at backblaze.  You can see it trying different pods in the requests, but it isn't having luck with any of them.

What I would expect to happen is that the low-level retries will run out eventually (may take some time since backblaze's timeouts are quite long - in your log it has got to 5 minutes) and it will do a full retry of the whole sync.

I think backblaze recommend you keep trying for something like 30 minutes in case a pod has failed and needs restarting.

Thanks @ncw. It does look like it's a Backblaze issue... in testing with v1.38 I'd got to 91% over a few days (!) and then -

`2017/11/29 18:25:33 DEBUG : xxx: Cancelling large file upload due to error: Post https://pod-000-1039-10.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx: net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 268292549
2017/11/29 18:25:43 ERROR : 201711061446.tar.gz: Failed to copy: Post https://pod-000-1039-10.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx: net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 268292549
2017/11/29 18:25:43 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: Post https://pod-000-1039-10.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx: net/http: HTTP/1.x transport connection broken: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 268292549`

At this point rclone recovers but restarts from the beginning.

Is this a limitation of the Backblaze B2 API - transfers cannot be resumed? No drops in my connection so it looks like large files and B2 don't play nicely.

@eodrap Please use [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) - I've put a lot of fixes in recently for large file uploads with dropbox.  The error above would have been retried with the beta and it would have gone through.

Thanks @ncw. I've tested v1.38-195-g47450ba3, the new transfer rate and progress reporting is a nice touch! I'm still getting errors which bring down the transfer -

`2017/11/30 21:40:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 10/10 (error Post https://pod-000-1038-11.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx/0004: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0)`
`2017/11/30 21:40:23 DEBUG : xxx: Error sending chunk 117: Post https://pod-000-1038-11.backblaze.com/b2api/v1/b2_upload_part/xxx/0004: http: ContentLength=268435496 with Body length 0`

Full log is attached. Would you suggest in this case I increase the --low-level-retries (I'm using the default)? Is there a timeout / retry delay option worth changing?

Thanks as always for the support.

[rclone-v1.38-195-g47450ba3.log](https://github.com/ncw/rclone/files/1520567/rclone-v1.38-195-g47450ba3.log)
